description.zh-cn: 中国仪器仪表与传感专家，回族，南京大学党委常委、副校长，中国科学院院士。
description.en: A Chinese expert in instrumentation and sensors, of Hui ethnicity, currently serving as a member of the Standing Committee of the Party Committee and Vice President of Nanjing University, and an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省合肥市下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the administration of Hefei City, Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国南京市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education located in Nanjing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家科学技术方面最高学术机构和全国自然科学与高新技术综合研究发展中心。
description.en: The national academy for natural sciences of the People's Republic of China and a comprehensive research and development center.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国黑龙江省哈尔滨市的一所著名高等学府。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education located in Harbin, Heilongjiang, China.

nodes.id: 中国科学院信息技术科学部

zh-cn: 中国科学院信息技术科学部
en: Division of Information Technical Sciences of the Chinese Academy of Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院的学部之一。
description.en: One of the academic divisions of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国电子信息科技领域内非营利性的全国性学术团体。
description.en: A non-profit, national academic organization in the field of electronic information science and technology in China.
Zheng Hairong is a native of Changfeng, Anhui.

position.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the Party Committee, Vice President

description.zh-cn: 郑海荣担任南京大学党委常委、副校长。
description.en: Zheng Hairong serves as a member of the Standing Committee of the Party Committee and Vice President of Nanjing University.

description.zh-cn: 郑海荣是中国科学院院士。
description.en: Zheng Hairong is an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，郑海荣是哈尔滨工业大学的校友。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Zheng Hairong is an alumnus of Harbin Institute of Technology.

relationships.target: 中国科学院信息技术科学部

description.zh-cn: 郑海荣是中国科学院信息技术科学部院士。
description.en: Zheng Hairong is an academician of the Division of Information Technical Sciences of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，郑海荣是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Zheng Hairong is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，郑海荣是中国电子学会会士。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Zheng Hairong is a fellow of the Chinese Institute of Electronics.
